languages.text: "Довольно! То, с каким тщанием ты пытаешься искусить меня на предательство, лишь укрепляет мою веру. Суд Инцендии праведный, а отвергших его еретиков ждет кара. Вот ты и исторг{mf||ла} мои сомнения, {mf|сыне|дщерь}. Разве это не прекрасно?"

traits.locale_text: "Довольно! То, с каким тщанием ты пытаешься искусить меня на предательство, лишь укрепляет мою веру. Суд Инцендии праведный, а отвергших его еретиков ждет кара. Вот ты и исторг{mf||ла} мои сомнения, {mf|сыне|дщерь}. Разве не прекрасно?"
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: "Enough! The pains you are taking to tempt me into betrayal are merely strengthening my faith. Incendia's justice is righteous, and retribution awaits the heretics who reject it. Now you have banished my doubt. Is that not wonderful?"
languages.original_text: "Довольно! То, с каким тщанием ты пытаешься искусить меня на предательство, лишь укрепляет мою веру. Суд Инцендии праведный, а отвергших его еретиков ждет кара. Вот ты и исторг{mf||ла} мои сомнения, {mf|сыне|дщерь}. Разве это не прекрасно?"

traits.locale_text: "Enough! The pains you are taking to tempt me to betrayal are merely strengthening my faith. Incendia's justice is righteous, and retribution awaits the heretics who reject it. Now you have banished my doubt, my {mf|son|daughter}. Is that not wonderful?"
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "Enough! The pains you are taking to tempt me into betrayal are merely strengthening my faith. Incendia's justice is righteous, and retribution awaits the heretics who reject it. Now you have banished my doubt. Is that not wonderful?"
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: “够了！你费尽心机想要引诱我背叛，但却让我的信仰更加坚定。因森蒂娅的举止是正义的，而那些拒绝正义的异端分子将遭到报应。如今，你已经打消了我的疑虑。这是件美妙的事情，不是吗？”
languages.original_text: "Enough! The pains you are taking to tempt me into betrayal are merely strengthening my faith. Incendia's justice is righteous, and retribution awaits the heretics who reject it. Now you have banished my doubt. Is that not wonderful?"

traits.locale_text: “够了！你费尽心机想要引诱我背叛，但却让我的信仰更加坚定了。因森蒂娅的举止是正义的，而那些拒绝正义的异端分子将遭到报应。如今，你已经打消了我的疑虑，我的{mf|孩子|女儿}。这是件美妙的事情，不是吗？”
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: 「十分だ！お前は私を裏切者の道に誘惑しようとするが、それは私の信仰を強めるだけだ。インセンディアの正義は正当だ。それを拒絶する異端者には報いが待っている。お前は私の迷いを追い払った。素晴らしいことじゃないか？」
languages.original_text: "Enough! The pains you are taking to tempt me into betrayal are merely strengthening my faith. Incendia's justice is righteous, and retribution awaits the heretics who reject it. Now you have banished my doubt. Is that not wonderful?"

traits.locale_text: 「十分だ！お前は私を裏切者の道に誘惑しようとするが、それは私の信仰を強めるだけだ。インセンディアの正義は正当だ。それを拒絶する異端者には報いが待っている。お前は私の迷いを追い払った。素晴らしいことじゃないか？」
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: «¡Ya basta! Los esfuerzos que hace para tentarme y que sucumba a la traición no hacen más que reforzar mi fe. La justicia de Incendia es justa y el castigo aguarda a los herejes que la rechazan. Ahora ha desterrado mi duda. ¿No es maravilloso?».
languages.original_text: "Enough! The pains you are taking to tempt me into betrayal are merely strengthening my faith. Incendia's justice is righteous, and retribution awaits the heretics who reject it. Now you have banished my doubt. Is that not wonderful?"

traits.locale_text: «¡Ya basta! Los esfuerzos que hace para tentarme y que sucumba a la traición no hacen más que reforzar mi fe. La justicia de Incendia es justa y el castigo aguarda a los herejes que la rechazan. Ahora ha desterrado mi duda, hij{mf|o|a} mí{mf|o|a}. ¿No es maravilloso?».
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: "Genug! Die Mühen, mit der Ihr versucht, mich zum Verrat zu bewegen, stärken meinen Glauben nur noch. Incendias Gerechtigkeit ist rechtschaffen, und alle Ketzer, die sie zurückweisen, erwartet Vergeltung. Nun habt Ihr meine Zweifel verbannt. Ist das nicht wunderbar?"
languages.original_text: "Enough! The pains you are taking to tempt me into betrayal are merely strengthening my faith. Incendia's justice is righteous, and retribution awaits the heretics who reject it. Now you have banished my doubt. Is that not wonderful?"

traits.locale_text: "Genug! Die Mühen, mit der Ihr versucht, mich zum Verrat zu bewegen, stärken meinen Glauben nur noch. Incendias Gerechtigkeit ist rechtschaffen, und alle Ketzer, die sie zurückweisen, erwartet Vergeltung. Nun habt Ihr meine Zweifel verbannt, {mf|mein Sohn|meine Tochter}. Ist das nicht wunderbar?"
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: « Assez ! Vous cherchez à me pousser à la trahison, mais vos piètres tentatives ne font que renforcer ma foi. La justice d'Incendia est absolue et les hérétiques qui oseraient s'y opposer seront châtiés. Vous avez dissipé mes doutes. N'est-ce pas magnifique ? »
languages.original_text: "Enough! The pains you are taking to tempt me into betrayal are merely strengthening my faith. Incendia's justice is righteous, and retribution awaits the heretics who reject it. Now you have banished my doubt. Is that not wonderful?"

traits.locale_text: « C'en est assez ! Vous cherchez à me pousser à la trahison, mais vos piètres tentatives ne font que renforcer ma foi. La justice d'Incendia est absolue et les hérétiques qui oseraient s'y opposer seront châtiés. Vous avez complètement dissipé mes doutes, {mf|mon fils|ma fille}. N'est-ce pas magnifique ? »
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: "Yeter! Beni ihanete kışkırtmak için döktüğün dil, yalnızca inancımı güçlendirmeye yarıyor. İncendia, adaleti sağlayarak doğru olanı yapıyor. Bu adaleti reddeden kâfirleri de yalnızca ceza bekliyor. Şüphelerimi bertaraf ettin. Muazzam bir işe imza attın."
languages.original_text: "Enough! The pains you are taking to tempt me into betrayal are merely strengthening my faith. Incendia's justice is righteous, and retribution awaits the heretics who reject it. Now you have banished my doubt. Is that not wonderful?"

traits.locale_text: "Yeter! Beni ihanet etmem için kışkırtmak için döktüğün dil, yalnızca inancımı güçlendirmeye yarıyor. İncendia adaleti sağlayarak doğru olanı yapıyor ve bu adaleti reddeden kâfirleri yalnızca ceza bekliyor. Şüphelerimi bertaraf ettin. Muazzam bir işe imza attın."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04
